en.title: Ringo Borlain, 2006 Mr Universe (Mixed Pair Category).
en.content:
Ringo Borlain and his partner, Dwan Abantao of the Philippines, were the FIRST Asians to win the prestigious Mr and Ms Universe titles (Mixed Pair Category), beating 250 participants from 39 countries at the 2006 Mr and Ms Universe Body Building Competition held in Cuxhnvun, Germany, joining the ranks of famous past winners like Arnold Schwarzenegger and Lou Ferigno (Incredible Hulk).

Below is the YouTube link of Ringo Borlain and his partner Dwan Abantao performing their winning routine.

Watch Video from YouTube.com for Ringo Borlain

You wouldn't believe this, bro! I broke my personal best on the bench press after using FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant! Plus I am still so hype up, have enough energy to split the training and do another session later. Wow! This is incredible and the guys at the gym were in awe at what is happening to me!
